title: O Come All Ye Faithful
lyrics:
O come, all ye faithful
Joyful and triumphant
O come ye
O come ye to Bethlehem
Come and behold him
Born the King of angels
O come, let us adore him
O come, let us adore him
O come, let us adore him
Christ the Lord, ooh
Sing, choirs of angels
Sing in exultation
Sing, all ye citizens
Of heaven above
Glory to God
Glory in the highest
O come
Let us adore him
O come
Let us adore him
Ooh, let us adore him
Christ the Lord
The Lord
Oh The Lord The Lord
Oh The Lord The Lord
Oh Christ the Lord, hmm
(The Lord)

O come
Let us adore him
O come
Let us adore him
Ooh, come let us adore him
Christ the Lord
Ooh, come let us adore him
Christ the Lord
